title: Why everything from your phone to your PC may get pricier in 2026
body: The price of Ram - once one of the cheapest computer parts - has more than doubled since October 2025.

title: China's BYD set to overtake Tesla as world's top EV seller
body: It would mark the first time the Chinese firm has outpaced its American rival for annual sales.

title: How the defence sector is battling a skills crisis
body: Attracting younger workers into the defence industry can be challenging.

title: Crypto users forced to share account details with tax officials
body: The move is designed to ensure people pay all relevant tax on buying and selling crypto.

title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
body: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again
body: Dan Richards, 37, from Swansea was injured in a freak accident on New Year's Eve in 2023.

title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids
body: The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.

title: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026
body: Dexter Original Sin actor Patrick Gibson will star as the British spy when the game releases on 27 May.

title: Many new UK drone users must take theory test before flying outside
body: The Civil Aviation Authority reckons up to half a million people in the UK may be impacted by its new requirements.

title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
body: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.
